title: Civil Rights Movement and American Democracy

vocab.definition: Basic rights and freedoms that belong to all citizens
Practice of separating people based on race
Peaceful protest method used to challenge injustice
Year-long protest against segregated public transportation
Process of bringing together previously separated groups

teachingNotes: Focus on key events and figures. Emphasize peaceful nature of civil rights protests and their effectiveness.
